articles.title: BCCI rejects Hyderabad's request for change in World Cup schedule - DAWN.com
articles.description: Hyderabad association had requested changes after local police authorities expressed reservations over deploying personnel on back-to-back match days.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: The Board of Control for Cricket in India on Monday officially turned down the request of the Hyderabad Cricket Association for a change in the schedule of the upcoming World Cup.
